aqua only change to turquoise and drop the aqua the thread should be hanging on the outer side of the work bring it in 17 single_crochet- turquoise only tch turn 19 row10 skip 2 = 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet- turquoise only change to aqua drop the turquoise 10 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs end with an ij foand hide all the tails left work chain 1 1 half_double_crochet 1 sl cy-po the skirt is long that s correct it forms a train skip 1 loop insert your hook in the next loop the 4th and repeat hide the tails left you can also embroider a small decor on the waist neckline crochet hook 2 0 mm work normally work yo work with aqua yarn you should have 5 front loops left from r21 you worked some stitches in r22 blo insert your hook in the first one from your right this is how your work should look so far and pull up a loop 11 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs need to change the way you distribute these increases before and after the end of the round based on where you find yourself at the end of r31 i did r32 1sc 1inc 4sc 1inc x2 20sc 1inc 3sc 40 here s an example of a possible adaptation head r32 1sc 1inc 4sc 1inc x2 20sc 1inc 3sc 4 single_crochet 1 increase 40 r33-r34 40 single_crochet 40 crochet hook 2 0 mm your work should look like the following picture work tight mark two spots at a distance of 7 stitches 1st work yu stitch marker on the 1st 2nd stitch markeronthe keep working in peach from where you left off 7th this distance willcorrespondtothedistance r28 6 increase 12 between the
